Body: Based on the article, the authors used what is known as a Markov model. This is actually the departure for discovering the linguistic value of a text, where the normal methods are those that are used in traditional Cryptanalysis, which is the attempt to discover the meaning (or linguistic value) of a text of seemingly random symbols or systems. More can be found in a basic introduction to Cryptography, and here: Wikipedia - Cryptography (#Cryptanalysis)
